forensic.name: The capture is canceled
forensic.desc:
I was listening to the radio broadcast here when I suddenly saw strange signals - some kind of new protocol, but I don't understand it at all. I thought about giving up, but I heard on the news that the copter was flying and no one knows its route. Maybe you can find at which point the drone flew at the maximum altitude? The coordinates of the place should be given by reference, ± 10m
maps.duckerz.ru:50013
z4vr1k_official

forensic.name: Vroom Vroom is cancelled
forensic.desc:
My car started messing up, check the data bus dump, maybe you'll find something interesting.
z4vr1k_official

forensic.name: silent streams
forensic.desc:
The factory floor went dark at 3 AM. When the lights came back on, everything looked normal - sensors still sending their readings, temperatures stable, humidity in range...
reroute0129

hw.name: Last try
hw.desc:
I am a security system operator at an old research facility.
-
There was a glitch three days ago. There is only one terminal that can reboot everything. But it requires the main emergency access code.
-
I entered the options. 999 times. I recorded each check — the oscilloscope recorded the processor's power consumption during the check.
-
The display is currently lit: "LAST ATTEMPT LEFT"
-
I don't have the correct code among the entries. But there are 999 examples of what the wrong one looks like.
-
Flag format: DUCKERZ{32_hex_parameter}
Leskes

hw.name: The abandoned lighthouse
hw.desc:
An Atmega168P-based automatic lighthouse is still operating on the abandoned coast. It transmits not only distress signals, but also some strange encrypted messages.

But it seems I made a mistake in one of my spells... Maybe you can find her and read my most important secret? ♡
